column1: SO250B BATTERSEA PIER JUNCTION TO LONGHEDGE JUNCTION
Battersea Pier Junction – Stewarts Lane Junction
SO250C POUPARTS JUNCTION TO LONGHEDGE JUNCTION
SO250D FALCON JUNCTION TO LATCHMERE JUNCTION (NO 1)
TIMING POINTFirst location is inclusive and secondlocation is exclusive (unless otherwisestated below)
Stoats Nest Junction – Redhill (via RedhillLines)
Stoats Nest Junction – Earlswood (viaQuarry Lines)
* A 2 minute headway may be applied if the second train converges from the Down Streatham Spur

** The “Following Non-Stopping” headway can also be applied to consecutive arrivals at:East Croydon where the previous station call has been either London Victoria, London Bridge or Clapham Junctionproviding the second train arrives in a different platform and the correct headway has been applied at the previoustiming point; and at Gatwick Airport where the previous station call has been London Victoria, London Bridge,Clapham Junction, East Croydon or Redhill providing the second train arrives in a different platform and the correctheadway has  been applied at the previous timing point
† A 2 minute headway may be applied between no more than two consecutive trains
